item.title: Thunderbird changes fonts in some messages, not all
item.description: Thunderbird is a great choice for a mail client on Linux systems if you prefer a GUI, but I had some problems with fonts in the most recent releases.

item.title: Customize LDAP autocompletion format in Thunderbird
item.description: Thunderbird can connect to an LDAP server and autocomplete email addresses as you type, but it needs some adjustment for some LDAP servers.

item.title: Thunderbird opens multiple windows
item.description: When I started Thunderbird today, it opened three windows.
